page.title: 15LOCAL DONCASTER STREET GAMES
page.content: OVER THE YEARS STREET GAMES HAVE CHANGED CONTINUALLY.NOWADAYS CHILDREN LIKE GAMES WITH FAST ACTION AND PLENTY OF COMPETITION.SOME OF THE GAMES THEY PLAY ARE 'BUZZ OFF','HOT RICE','TIGS' AND 'TRAFFIC LIGHTS'. {'BUZZ OFF'}IS LIKE 'HIDE AND SEEK'. {'HOT RICE'}IS ANOTHER FAST ACTION GAME.A BALL IS BOUNCED IN THE CENTRE OF A CIRCLE.THE PERSON WHOSE LEGS IT GOES THROUGH IS'ON' AND HAS TO CATCH THE OTHERS AS IN{'TIGS'. {'TAFFIC LIGHTS'}CAN BE PLAYED BY ANY NUMBER OF PEOPLE.ONE PERSON STANDS IN THE MIDDLE OF A SQUARE AND SHOUTS OUT COLOURS FOR THE OTHER PEOPLE TO RUN TO. BY DOING A SURVEY WE FOUND THAT 'HOT RICE' IS THE MOST POPULAR GAME AT THE MOMENT.
